Posts.Content: May 19, 2015 12:01PM Som wrote: I had 4 dose dense A/C treatments followed by 12 weekly taxol treatments.  My hair started to grow back on my head during week 6 of taxol, which I was surprised about.  However, once I was finished with chemo, then all of my eyelashes fell out, but they grew back quickly in a couple weeks.
Posts.Title: Hair Hair Hair - Another question Deen Krose53
Would you mind sharing your age at time of diagnosis? ByFaith Gussy
